website_summaries.verdict: With plenty of storage that fits any PS4 model and a few accessories, this is the best carrying case available.
pros: The ripstop nylon material is durable and does a great job of protecting your console and your controllers
Customers love the available space and have no trouble fitting 2 controllers and a headset in addition to their console and its cables
The strap and handle are comfortable, and the outside bag has plenty of room for games
cons: A few customers noted an unusual smell that dissipated over time

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the PS4
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. I am a 40 year old who travels often for business. The last thing I want to do is walk in to a hotel with some crazy colored gamer bag that screams I'll be out trying to catch pokemons later in the lobby. The bag outside edges are not heavily padded so be aware you aren't going to want to be abusive or check this luggage with the airlines. The compartments are customizeable with velcro dividers which is nice and it is thick enough to hold my accessories like the Sony headset. I cannot comment on if it will hold the VR.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fits the PlayStation 4 Pro Console Perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was going on a business trip and didn't want to put my PS4 Pro in my suitcase. I read quite a few reviews, especially the negative ones, and will admit that I was a little wary...mostly because a few of them said that the PS4 Pro didn't fit. Well, I own the PlayStation 4 Pro 1TB Limited Edition Console and, as you can see by the pictures, it fits perfectly. It was easy to carry, kept everything protected, didn't smell funny. Overall, a very solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Martian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS. Perfect. would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for christmas because he does a lot of moving his playstation around between his house and mine. With all the traveling his headset usually ends up breaking. With his he can put his controller, Playstation 4, headset, cords, and even his games, along with any other small things he needs to pack. This is built very nicely and does not feel cheap. He was very excited to get this and im very happy i went with this item. He can now travel without the worry of his belongings being broken.
customer_reviews.author: Derenda

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I was traveling a lot for work and missed my ps4. This case is sturdy and protective. Plenty of room for cables in the ps4 side and all the accessories + a switch on the other side. Plus the black looks professional and boring - totally says nothing worth stealing here. Guess that won't be true anymore if a lot of people start buying it. It's been on at least 4 trips with me and totally more reliable than hotel wifi. The shouder strap makes it easy to carry with a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it before my humanitarian mission to Central America and was extremely happy that I did. It is well constructed and provides plenty of protection for my PS4-Pro & accessories. With ease, this case fit my PS4-Pro, wired headset, 5 games, two controllers and all necessary cables. This is a MUCH safer option than simply tossing these items individually in a luggage and hoping they are unscathed when it arrives at your destination. Travel with peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Works for packing PS4
customer_reviews.text: The case splits into 2 sections, one for my ps4 the other for accessories. It's better than the original cardboard box I was using. It's a little wide, but I'll take the trade-off of bulky versus not being able to pack what I want. A little pricey, but seemed the best option I could find. Now I'll see how the durability plays out over time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who travels all the time and was getting bored in hotels. He loves it! His PlayStation is his pride and would be devastated if something happened. He has no fear of that happening with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with lots of customization options
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for what I needed. I used to travel back and forth between my parents homes, and needed something simple and safe for transporting my system. I'm able to fit the console, one controller, all necessary cables, and about 8 game cases, with a little extra room to spare. The pockets can be rearranged in many many different ways to accommodate whatever you need to transport, and all of the velcro straps hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not hard case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for taking my PS4 with me when I travel. It's perfect. It holds the PS4, 2 controllers, headset, games, and associated cables with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brad McHenry

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an after Christmas gift for a 12 year old. He was carrying his PS4 in a cloth tote bag. He uses it every weekend and seems to like it. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: customerfn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect the the PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Perfect the the PS4 Pro. I went through several cases that I didn't care for before I found this case. I LOVE this one. Totally recommend this case over others.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and bring either my PS4 or XBOX1 with me and this bag holds the system nice and secure. Holds a ton of games a couple of controlers and all the plugs love it.

customer_reviews.title: Game Console Traveling Necessities
customer_reviews.text: Just what my sons wanted! They were always trying to find a duffle bag or something to carry their system’s and accessories safely. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cor PS4, missing room for headset
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great, fits my PS4, has another compartment that is subdivided for PS4 remotes, wires, external hard drive (things that are small and relatively flat. Has an outside pocket that can fit many games. The only downside is I have a headset that covers both my ears and I have no way to fit it in there so I have to carry it separately. No big deal considering how well it packs everything else
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Denis Boucher

customer_reviews.title: but it smells horrible! There is a strong distinct smell of tobacco ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Product is as described, but it smells horrible! There is a strong distinct smell of tobacco coming off of this case. I am hoping airing it out will fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Nisa

customer_reviews.title: Protects well, and is perfect for airport.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for PS4 pro by plane. Size is right, and security just has you lay it open rather than pulling out the system and putting in a bin for the machine at the airport. If you are on the fence about a PS4 case, don't be, this is an easy one that protects incredibly well.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Protection for my PS4 while traveling to and from college. I’ve purchased one for each son when they went to college.

The shoulder strap allows for hands-free carrying as well.

customer_reviews.title: FITS MORE THAN JUST A PS4 CONSOLE
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing. It has a very low profile without any logos or obvious lettering giving away to the public that it holds my PS4. What I'm mostly happy about is that it carries much more than intended. It additionally carries my extra dual shock controller, dual shock controller charger with battery packs, Nintendo Switch inside a carrying case (including all cables, grips, the dock, and additional joycon silicone cases), and 2 Nintendo 3DS handheld systems with their respective chargers inside a carrying case. I can't find anything else that beats this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! I was able to fit both my ps3 and ps4 perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: This case is extremely useful and a little more spacious than the picture leads ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is extremely useful and a little more spacious than the picture leads to believe. I have traveled over 30,000 miles over plane and I always have my PS4 in this case and in checked baggage. We all know how rough those people are with luggage, but because of this case my PS4 comes out unscathed every time!

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for traveling ps4 gamers!
customer_reviews.text: I love how much space there is. You can move the dividers around to make things fit snug and you can even use the spare ones as padding on top. I'm honestly really surprised on how good of quality this is. Definitely worth the money! I fit my ps4 about 5 games. A controller. My headest and my Nintendo switch in the compartment above. And the pocket outside has alot of room for wires and other items. Even a net to hold the smaller items you don't want to lose!

customer_reviews.title: Works great for travelling.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage option for the traveling gamer. Compartments are easily customizable for various needs. Work well for PS4 1 TB system. Would also work well for slim. Pro would be snug fit but potentially would work. Holds 2 controllers, required cords, full size headphones with some room to spare.

customer_reviews.title: Worked travelling across the country and staying in varies hotels ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked travelling across the country and staying in varies hotels for over a month with a PS4 Pro, several games, two controllers, and the PS wireless headphones. The over the ear headphones are slightly thicker than what the case intended to hold but found not issue with the headphones going inside beside the tight fit in the little cubbie.

customer_reviews.title: Great for PS4 and accessories
customer_reviews.text: All dividers within the two separate compartments are removable. The PS4 fits on one side with all dividers removed (photo 1). The cords and accessories fit nicely in the second compartment (photo 2). It has a shoulder strap and a padded, velcro handle plus an outside zippered pocket (photo 3). A very nice case, and I'm very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an ash tray and the padding is thin
customer_reviews.text: The padding is pretty thin, but that would be fine if it didn't smell like an old ash tray. I left it spread open in my garage for over a week, but the smell hasn't dissipated. It protected my PS4 Pro enough for one trip, but i will be replacing it before traveling again. Two stars because it did keep everything in tact. No damage. Just set the bag down like its full of eggs, and you'll be fine,

product_meta.title: USA GEAR Console Carrying Case - PS4 Case Compatible with Playstation 4 Slim, PS4 Pro, and PS3 - Customizable Interior Store PS4 Games, PS4 Controller, PS4 Headset, and More Gaming Accessories (Black)
feature_bullets: DURABLE DESIGN: Made with tightly woven RipStop Nylon over a reinforced shell and scratch resistant interior, our PS4 Pro Case provides the ultimate protection for you console and gaming accessories
LARGER THAN THE COMPETITION: Be it controllers, cables, headphones, VR headset, or anything else you need, the customizable and spacious interior can hold it all. Fits all PS4 and PS3 Console Models
EXTERNAL ZIPPERED POCKET: For even more storage and customization, our PS4 bag features external pockets for smaller items like HDMI cables, power cables, and anything else you need quick access to
PADDED SHOULDER STRAP & HANDLE: The S13 features 2 convenient carrying options to sling over your shoulder or comfortably carry in hand || Padded dividers provide extra protection for your gear

3 YEAR WARRANTY: All USA Gear products are premium quality made, and to show our faith in this, we back all our merchandise by a 3 year Manufacturer Warranty || Exterior Dimensions: 15 x 12 x 6 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars238 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
